parser.xmlParsing

Class XMLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.xmlParsing.XMLParser

  • public class XMLParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for parsing the XML-file of the play.
    Author:
    rom54494

        scene - the current scene
        Returns:
        The constructed Tweet

      • run

        public void run()
        Method responsible for parsing the XML.
        The file will be parsed and the contents will be given back by calling insertLine of the DBCInterface.
